report.name: 开发区财政收入前20位企业收入情况
report.description: 开发区财政收入前20位企业收入情况
report.paraProcesses:
SELECT to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') from dual
SELECT to_char(sysdate,'mm') from dual
SELECT to_char(sysdate,'dd') from dual
-->
report.title: $nian$$yue$开发区财政收入前20位企业收入情况

rptData.sql: select * from ( select r.xh,d.mc,r.dl,r.sl,r.zje,r.zf from ( select d.xh,d.swdjzh,d.czzsr dl,s.czzsr sl,d.czzsr-s.czzsr zje,round(decode(s.czzsr,0,0,(d.czzsr-s.czzsr)/s.czzsr*100),2)||'%' zf from( select rownum xh,swdjzh,czzsr from (select swdjzh,sum(czzsr) czzsr from rtk_ylb where nian={nian} and yue={yue} and ylbj=1 and mc is not null group by swdjzh order by czzsr desc) where rownum<21) d, (select swdjzh,sum(czzsr) czzsr from rtk_ylb where nian={nian}-1 and yue={yue} and ylbj=1 and mc is not null group by swdjzh) s where d.swdjzh=s.swdjzh(+) ) r,tmp_dj d where r.swdjzh=d.swdjzh union all select 21 xh,'合计' mc,sum(dl) dl,sum(sl) sl,sum(dl)-sum(sl) zje,round(decode(sum(sl),0,0,(sum(dl)-sum(sl))/sum(sl)*100),2)||'%' zf from( select r.xh,d.mc,r.dl,r.sl,r.zje,r.zf from ( select d.xh,d.swdjzh,d.czzsr dl,s.czzsr sl,d.czzsr-s.czzsr zje,round(decode(s.czzsr,0,0,(d.czzsr-s.czzsr)/s.czzsr*100),2)||'%' zf from( select rownum xh,swdjzh,czzsr from (select swdjzh,sum(czzsr) czzsr from rtk_ylb where nian={nian} and yue={yue} and ylbj=1 and mc is not null group by swdjzh order by czzsr desc) where rownum<21) d, (select swdjzh,sum(czzsr) czzsr from rtk_ylb where nian={nian}-1 and yue={yue} and ylbj=1 and mc is not null group by swdjzh) s where d.swdjzh=s.swdjzh(+) ) r,tmp_dj d where r.swdjzh=d.swdjzh) ) order by xh
